In line 14 is aan alliteration which underlines that if anybody can proofprove that he is wrong with his idea of love no man ever loved.

The words he uses are very positive.

But there are a few to show what love is not.

All in all you can see that Shakespeare uses his structure and the language to support his idea of love and influence the reader to have positive thoughts about love.
